A compound selected from the group consisting of

A method of using an antioxidant polymer comprising one or more [1,2]-dithiolanes derivatives to treat a condition in a subject in need thereof, comprising:
providing a composition comprising the antioxidant polymer and a pharmaceutically acceptable carrier; and
administering a therapeutically effective amount of the composition to the subject to treat the condition,
wherein the condition is selected from the group consisting of oxidative stress, skin condition caused by reactive oxygen species, and cancer.
The method of claim 178, wherein the condition is cancer and the composition increases the cytotoxicity of a cancer chemotherapeutic agent.
